text: The 2018 Tour Cycliste Féminin International de l'Ardèche is a women's cycle stage race held in Francehttp://www.tcfia.org/ from 13 September to 18 September, 2018. The tour has an UCI rating of 2.1.http://women.cyclingfever.com/editie.html?editie_id=251873http://www.tcfia.com/images/PDF/2017/guide_technique_TCFIA_2017_v3.pdf ==Stages== {| class=wikitable |+List of stages |- !Stage !Date !Course !Distance !Type !Winner |- !align=center|1 |align=center| 13 September | Saint-Marcel-d'Ardèche to Beauchastel |align=center| | link= Flat stage | |- !align=center|2 |align=center| 13 September | Saint-Fortunat-sur-Eyrieux to Cruas |align=center| | link= Flat stage | |- !align=center|3 |align=center| 14 September | Saint-Sauveur-de-Montagut to Villeneuve-de-Berg |align=center| | link= Mountain stage | |- !align=center|4 |align=center| 15 September | Châteauneuf-de-Gadagne to Mont-Serein Station |align=center| | link= Mountain stage | |- !align=center|5 |align=center| 16 September |Grandrieu to Mont Lozère |align=center| | link= Mountain stage | |- !align=center|6 |align=center| 17 September |Savasse to Montboucher-sur-Jabron |align=center| | link= Mountain stage | |- !align=center|7 |align=center| 18 September | Chomérac to Privas |align=center| | link= Mountain stage | |- !colspan=3| Total !colspan=5| |} ==Classification leadership== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; font-size:86%;" |- style="background-color: #efefef;" !
